name: Freight Shift
description:
Silly little game my friend and I made for Halloween in a few weeks. Really simple and easy to pick up but who knows I didn't have anyone else play test this thing lol.

Controls are as follow:

Z - Light attack

X - Heavy attack

Space - Jump

Escape - Pause

Enter - Press enter when you dont know what else to press

This game is only for Windows unfortunately because Apple doesnt like us. So if you have a Mac then go steal your friend's Windows PC

Have fun and make fun of me for when you eventually find a ton of bugs.
